A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually impressive movie\, but one that will leave many Star Wars fans disappointed. Controversial treatment of certain beloved central characters and a distinct lack of universe-building and lore expansion left me...unfulfilled as I left the theater.  Established characters had disappointing development\, new characters were largely useless. However\, the movie definitely has its breathtaking cinematic moments and some brilliant acting sprinkled throughout. Overall\, based on a single viewing - I am just frustrated and sad at the lost potential of this movie.
